TopicTitle: How is your relationship with the Kraken?

Articles.Content:
I am friends with the Kraken. He never attacked any of my ships, and I give him some shrines as presents. Sometimes he even helps me, by pushing my ships and rovers if they get stuck or run out of fuel.

Is the Kraken your friend too?
He's my intimate friend. NSFW, so let's not get into details.

So the overkerbal nemesis of many has just been declared to be a friend by some.

A schism goes through the kerbal society.

The rise of Krakenism, heretics to the majority of Kerbal society.

Can you make a new option in the poll for the atheists, that do not believe in the Kraken?

He must like me, because I've only ever had 2 or 3 real Kraken attacks since I started playing the game (so in ~250 hours of gameplay). Sure, one of those attacks corrupted a save I'd been working on for weeks but it's nice to think of that as some kind of protection fee

I wouldn't say friends exactly (perhaps he/she/it wants to be my friend, but scary Kraken is scary), but we've met and I don't hate anything for it

Can you make a new option in the poll for the atheists, that do not believe in the Kraken?

BLASPHEMY!
Why is there no 'We are more than friends' option? Bad poll...

The Kraken is the One True God. All Kerbals worship It and hope someday to be carried by It into Its Own Dimension. This is the main reason Kerbals go to space, in hopes that The Kraken will take them. So far from being the nemesis of Kerbals, The Kraken is their friend and protector. It is The Kraken that keeps Kerbin rolling neatly along its rails, after all. So if The Kraken demands a sacrifice, it's a small price to pay.

We're O.K.

I avoid it, and in return it avoids me :-)

.

.

.

300'th post... YEEEAAAhhhh >:-O

The Kraken is the One True God. All Kerbals worship It and hope someday to be carried by It into Its Own Dimension. This is the main reason Kerbals go to space, in hopes that The Kraken will take them. So far from being the nemesis of Kerbals, The Kraken is their friend and protector. It is The Kraken that keeps Kerbin rolling neatly along its rails, after all. So if The Kraken demands a sacrifice, it's a small price to pay.

Fun fact: It is possible to reach the krakens dimension in-game.
The Kraken and I are totally friends with benefits.
We went out once and now he won't return my calls. He take a different route home everyday, cut down the tree I used to sit in and wait for him in. Then there is the restraining order.....
He is my friend, considering I'm an ex-kraken drive scientist it was sort of implied.
I haven't really had any run-ins with the kraken ever since I began playing in .18.4

I just Keep him contained!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Last time I saw him at work was in version 0.17, since then I haven't had any problem regarding him.

Can you make a new option in the poll for the atheists, that do not believe in the Kraken?

No one does simply not believe in the kraken.
As the gal that invented the K-drive, I'd like to think that we are buddies!
